CustomField.description: Use in conjunction with Max Query Rows. This determines the maximum possible rollup jobs (either batched or queued) that can be spawned from a single overall rollup operation. Default is 100.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use in conjunction with Max Query Rows. This determines the maximum possible rollup jobs (either batched or queued) that can be spawned from a single overall rollup operation. Default is 100.
CustomField.label: Max Rollup Retries
